name: Stay Out Of The Farm: Prologue
name_original: Stay Out Of The Farm: Prologue
description:
This is a prologue of full game "Stay Out Of The Farm" a PS1 styled horror game.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2166450/Stay_Out_Of_The_Farm/



Stay Out Of The Farm: Prologue is a free part of full game "Stay Out Of The Farm" a stealth-driven slasher with old school PS1 style graphics. Here you can try to get through beginning of the bloody path to escape. Use your intelligence to beat killer in a blody game of cat and mouse. During your way to escape you need to stay quite and stay out of sight, owner of the farm is not about to let his newest guest leave so soon.




MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION:
Corpses, blood, guts, decapitation
